article_title: Your Elected Leaders: Obamacare is not a solution for Utah
article_text: Utah House Speaker Greg Hughes represents District 51 in Draper. He is a small business owner working in real estate development and property management. Hughes was elected to the Utah Legislature in 2002 and in 2014 was elected Speaker of the Utah House of Representatives.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , obamacare, greg hughes, medicade, utah health care
article_metadata.author:
Greg Hughes
Utah House Speaker

Hughes was elected to the Utah Legislature in 2002 and in 2014 was elected Speaker of the Utah House of Representatives.
Utah House Speaker Greg Hughes represents District 51 in Draper.
He is a small business owner working in real estate development and property management.
